content: Get well soon Dawg! All the best to ya! No one starts a war--or rather, no one in his senses ought to do so--without first being clear in his mind what he intends to achieve by that war and how he intends to conduct it. Carl von Clausewitz

content: Dawg, get better ASAP and get back to your Troll Patrols in here. We need ya! Don

content: Get well fast, Dawg! There's Trolls tickling the wire all over the place! Let slip the Dawgs of war! It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine
